theme.fieldDescription: Select the theme color of the page
theme.name: ./theme

favicon-icon.fieldDescription: Select Favicon Icon for browser tab
favicon-icon.name: ./faviconIcon

feature-image.fieldDescription: Select an Image to be used as Featured image for this Page
feature-image.name: ./featureImage

nav-image.fieldDescription: Select an Image to be used as Navigation image for this page.
nav-image.name: ./navImage

mobile-nav-image.fieldDescription: Select an Image to be used as Navigation image for this page on Mobile Devices. Note: If BLANK, Use Nav image for both Desktop and Mobile.
mobile-nav-image.name: ./mobileNavImage

hideInSiteMap.fieldDescription: Page will not appear in site map if this option is enabled.
hideInSiteMap.name: ./hideInSiteMap
hideInSiteMap.text: Hide content items in site map.

searchHighlight.fieldDescription: The page will be in the top of the search results after sorting by priority.
searchHighlight.name: ./searchHighlight
searchHighlight.text: Highlight the page in search results.

no-cache-cdn.fieldDescription: Please select the checkbox to set no cache header for CDN (akamai).
no-cache-cdn.name: ./noCacheHeaderCdn

no-cache-dispatcher.fieldDescription: Please select the checkbox to set no cache header for dispatcher.
no-cache-dispatcher.name: ./noCacheHeaderDispatcher

pageAuthor.fieldDescription: Select the Author/Modifier Group of page
pageAuthor.name: ./pageAuthor

loginModal-not-required.fieldDescription: Check this if Login Modal is not required on page.
loginModal-not-required.name: ./noLoginModal

allow-all.text: Allow search engines to index this page

index-follow.text: Allow search engines to index this page + Don't follow links on the page

noindex-nofollow.text: Prevent search engines from indexing this page + Don't follow links on the page

noindex-follow.text: Prevent search engines from indexing this page + Do follow links on the page

canonical-url.fieldDescription: Select the Canonical url for Page.
canonical-url.name: ./canonicalUrl

error-pages.fieldDescription: Error pages for this content tree
error-pages.name: ./errorPages

region.fieldDescription: Specify region property for the destination page.
region.name: ./region

city.fieldDescription: Specify city property for the destination page.
city.name: ./city

searchCategories.fieldDescription: Select search categories for the page
searchCategories.name: ./searchCategories

isFeatured.fieldDescription: check if you want this page to be in featured Search
isFeatured.name: ./isFeatured

isMobileExcluded.fieldDescription: check if you want this page to not be in indexed on Mobile
isMobileExcluded.name: ./isExcludedMobileIndex
